metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17466 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect texture handling in Angle in Google Chrome prior to 70.0.3538.67 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory read via a crafted HTML page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

firefox - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '64.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:60.4.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
